title: James Dean Worley ////// 51
description:
James Dean Worley ////// 51


TrueCrimeGarage.com


Sierah Joughin a college student on a bike ride on a rural county road goes missing. Police searching the area find evidence of a possible struggle and worse a possible abduction. Before Sierah can be located police have a suspect but what police find at the property of 57 year old James Dean Worley is described as a secret room designed to hold humans against their will. As the authorities continue to look for Sierah they fear the worst and the man they believe to be responsible for her dissappearance is in their custody and they tell the media they now believe James Dean Worley to be a serial abductor and possible serial killer.


Beer of the Week - Knot Normal by 5 Toes Brewing

Garage Grade - 4 1/4 bottle caps out of 5

Beer Fund: https://truecrimegarage.com/home
author: truecrimegarage@gmail.com (TRUE CRIME GARAGE)
